name: SCPH
description:
The game takes place at a psychiatric hospital named Sanity Care. The sole purpose of the hospital is to find the best method in which to raise and harness an inner beast that can reside within a child. After 60 years of very small progress the hospital is being threatened to have all funds cut and the entire facility along with it's doctors disposed of.

With time running out the doctors at the facility shift their attention to a promising child that arrived 2 years earlier.

You play as that child's brother
